SEARCH
Package org.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
org.Model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Player class handles the properties related a Player of the game and provide the features to change those properties.

    • getNegotiatedPlayerByName

      public Player getNegotiatedPlayerByName(String p_playerName)
      Returns the player object , provided the name. With whom the current player has TRUCE with
      Parameters:
      p_playerName - : Name of the player contained in a string
      Returns:
      l_player : Returns a player object if the player is found in the negotiated list, if not found returns null.

      Parameters:

    • negotiationCheckForAttack

      public Boolean negotiationCheckForAttack(String p_country)
      Check if the country to be attacked, if the current player has TRUCE with it. OR we can say, the country to be attacked is not owned by a player. With whom the current player has negotiated with.
      Parameters:
      p_country - : Name of the country for which it needs to be checked
      Returns:
      true / false : If country cannot be attacked returns TRUE or return FALSE

    • clearNegotiatedPlayers

      public void clearNegotiatedPlayers()
      If the player has used the negotiate card, usually the d_negotiatedPlayers list will have an entry This entry needs to be cleared. When the turn ends. This function facilitates that.

    • getCapturedCountryByName

      public Country getCapturedCountryByName(String p_countryName)
      Searching the list of the country by the country name and returns the country object representing particular country.
      Parameters:
      p_countryName - : Name of the country
      Returns:
      l_country , if the country is found, else returns NULL.

      Returns:
      l_continent , if the continent is found , else returns NULL.

      Returns:

    • createDeployOrder

      public void createDeployOrder(Command l_cmd) throws InvalidCommand, InvalidState
      Helper function to help in creation of the Deploy Order Stores the Deploy order in player based list called d_orderList Later executed in OrderExecutionPhase of the game.
      Parameters:
      l_cmd - : Command object which contains the deploy order string
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - : Throws InvalidCommand if the command provided by user is wrong
      InvalidState - : If player doesn't have enough reinforcement to continue with the deployment

    • createAdvanceOrder

      public void createAdvanceOrder(Command l_cmd, GameState p_currentGameState) throws InvalidCommand
      Helper function to help in creation of the Advance Order Stores the Advance order in player based list called d_orderList Later executed in OrderExecutionPhase of the game.
      Parameters:
      l_cmd - : Command object which contains the advance order string
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - : Throws InvalidCommand if the command provided by user is wrong

    • issue_order

      public void issue_order(Order d_order)
      Function as specified by build document which stores the order to the top of the order list according to COMMAND PATTERN design.
      Parameters:
      d_order - : Command object which contains the order needed for execution

    • next_order

      public Order next_order()
      Function as specified by build document which returns the order required for execution
      Returns:
      l_order : The order needed for execution

    • assignCard

      public void assignCard(GameState p_gameState)
      Assign random cards to player according to the turn.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - : Gamestate object for various common function.

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(String p_card)
      Remove card from the player , list of cards.
      Parameters:
      p_card - : The card which needs to be removed

    • createAirliftOrderCard

      public void createAirliftOrderCard(Command l_cmd, GameState p_gameState) throws InvalidCommand, InvalidState
      Function to create an Airlift based order and later using issue_order for adding the order to the players order list
      Parameters:
      l_cmd - : Command object which has store the command issued from player
      p_gameState - : Gamestate object specifying the current state of the game
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - : If the command is invalid , the exception is raised
      InvalidState - : If the countries provided is invalid , InvalidState exception is raised.

    • createBlockadeOrderCard

      public void createBlockadeOrderCard(Command l_cmd, GameState p_gameState) throws InvalidCommand, InvalidState
      Function to create Bloackade based order and later using issue_order for adding the order to the players order list

      p_gameState - : Gamestate object specifying the current state of the game
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - : If the command is invalid , the exception is raised
